column2: DONELL1,3 1Institute of Orthopaedics, Norfolk and Norwich University Hospital NHS Trust, Norwich, United Kingdom 2Department of Physiotherapy, Norfolk and Norwich University Hospital NHS Trust, Norwich, United Kingdom 3School of Medicine, Health Policy and Practice, University of East Anglia, Norwich, United Kingdom  There remains controversy over whether the vastus medialis is a single anatomical structure or whether it is composed of two separate portions, the vastus medialis longus proximally and the vastus medialis obliquus distally. David Heylings from the Faculty of Health, University of East Anglia, for his advice during the development of this work.
